bzh.plealog.hge.api.function

Class FunctionSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • bzh.plealog.hge.api.function.FunctionSystem

  • public final class FunctionSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    This class centralized the set of functions available in the system.
    Author:
    Patrick G. Durand

      • addFunction

        public static boolean addFunction(Function func)
                           throws FunctionException
        Add a new function. Do not add function if it already exists in the system.
        Parameters:
        func - the function to add
        Returns:
        false if the function cannot be added to the system
        Throws:
        FunctionException - if an error occurs (className undefined, interface Function not implemented)

      • addFunction

        public static boolean addFunction(Function func,
                  boolean force)
                           throws FunctionException
        Add a new function.
        Parameters:
        func - the function to add
        force - use true to force the system to add function even if its already exists in the system
        Returns:
        false if the function cannot be added to the system
        Throws:
        FunctionException - if an error occurs (className undefined, interface Function not implemented)
